name: Speed Runner [Lost in Time]
description:
Information:

In Beta mode. Lost In Time will still have Updates,  Bug Fixes, Glitches Etc. My game is in beta mode, and may have some issues, bugs or even small gameplay, there is going to be even more time spent into Lost In Time.

A  Speed Runner the faster you beat the game. The better you are at playing it.


Controls:

Moving  : [W] [A] [S] [D]

Jumping : [Space bar]

Pause game : [Escape]

zooming in : [Right Click Mouse]
